mapper.select: select * from board where writer=#{writer} order by posted desc

select a.* from ( SELECT b.* FROM board b join relationship r on b.writer = r.receiver join member m on r.receiver = m.id where b.writer=#{writer} and r.sender =#{sender} and b.public_yn='y' and m.publicyn='y' and r.status!='y' and now() >= date_add(b.posted, interval 1 minute) group by b.board_seq union SELECT b.* FROM board b join relationship r on b.writer = r.receiver where b.writer=#{writer} and r.sender =#{sender} and r.status='y' and now() >= date_add(b.posted, interval 1 minute) group by b.board_seq union SELECT b.* FROM board b join member m on b.writer = m.id where b.writer=#{writer} and b.public_yn='y' and m.publicyn='y' and now() >= date_add(b.posted, interval 1 minute) group by b.board_seq ) a order by a.posted desc
select m.* from member m join board b on m.id = b.writer where b.writer = #{writer} group by m.id

SELECT count(*) FROM relationship WHERE receiver=#{id} AND status='y' union SELECT count(*) FROM relationship WHERE sender=#{id} AND status='y' union SELECT count(*) FROM relationship WHERE sender=#{id} AND status='r'
